fields.name: Beginner English Language Course -  10 Lessons
fields.description:
Are you confused? Do you want to learn English but don't know how to start? 
No problem, we are here to help you! 
The beginner's course in English lasts approximately 90 days, at the end of which you get the A1 degree. The price of the package of 10 lessons is only €250.

fields.name: Intermediate English Language Course - 10 Lessons
fields.description: Congratulations, you have passed the first step for learning English. Are you ready for the second step? We are ready to offer you the best quality lessons to improve your English level. At a price of only €300 for 10 lessons.

fields.name: Advanced English Language Course - 10 Lessons
fields.description: Your English is at a very good level at the moment, but there is always room for improvement. We offer you the last valid course at the highest level for the best available price. The price of €500 for the last 15 lessons.

fields.name: Business English Language Course - 20 Lessons
fields.description:
Do you have a very good level of English and do you want to pass the level for business? We are here to help you. 
At a price of only €1,000 for 20 intensive private lessons, your English level will go to another considerable level.
